quote: Imagination is what you do with your inspiration.
author: Violet Haberdasher

quote: Imagination is a process of seeing events or things with the minds eye.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Imagination is Everything!
author: Termina Ashton

quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A human being always acts and feels and performs in accordance with what he imagines to be true about himself and his environment...For imagination sets the goal ‘picture’ which our automatic mechanism works on. We act, or fail to act, not because of ‘will,’ as is so commonly believed, but because of imagination.
author: Maxwell Maltz,  New Psycho-Cybernetics

quote: I believe that the imagination is the passport we create to take us into the real world. I believe the imagination is another phrase for what is most uniquely us.
author: John Guare,  Six Degrees of Separation

quote: Imagination is like a muscle. I found out that the more I wrote, the bigger it got.
author: Philip José Farmer

quote: Imagination is the highest form of research.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Imagination doesn't always make you long for what you cannot have, but rather thrive in what you do not have.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Imagination is at the root of much that passes for love.
author: Gilbert Parker

quote: Imagination does not become great until human beings, given the courage and the strength, use it to create.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: My imagination functions much better when I don't have to speak to people.
author: Patricia Highsmith

quote: An idea is salvation by imagination
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Imagination is the source of every form of human achievement. And it's the one thing that I believe we are systematically jeopardizing in the way we educate our children and ourselves.
author: Ken Robinson

quote: Imagination is the voice of daring. If there is anything godlike about God, it is that. He dared to imagine everything
author: Henry Miller,  Sexus

quote: The limits of your imagination create the boundaries of your world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: It is through imagination that we transcend understanding and travel into the world of possibilities.
author: Danielle Pierre,  Just Make It Happen!

quote: My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world and exiles me from it.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: To realize your imagination, go with trust in the direction of your destination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Imagination is the true magic carpet.
author: Norman Vincent Peale,  Norman Vincent Peale: Three Complete Books: The Power of Positive Thinking; The Positive Principle Today; Enthusiasm Makes the Difference

quote: I think imagination is at the heart of everything we do. Scientific discoveries couldn't have happened without imagination. Art, music, and literature couldn't exist without imagination. And so anything that strengthens imagination, and reading certainly does that, can help us for the rest of our lives.
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: When one paints an ideal, one does not need to limit one's imagination.
author: Ellen Key

quote: Imagination is cheap as long as you don't have to worry about the details.
author: Daniel C. Dennett,  Freedom Evolves

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Imagination is a quality that was given to man compensate him from whats not. The sense of humor was given to console him from what is.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Our imagination is bigger than this universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you can capture a woman's imagination, then you will have her. But imagination is a strange creature. It needs time and distance to function properly.
author: Kathleen Tessaro

quote: Imagine others complexly.
author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quote: Stories of imagination tend to upset those without one.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
author: Mark Twain,  A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court

quote: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Closed in a room, my imagination becomes the universe, and the rest of the world is missing out.
author: Criss Jami,  Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality

quote: My imagination is something of a badass.
author: D.C. Pierson,  The Boy Who Couldn't Sleep and Never Had To

quote: Our thoughts, imaginations, and actions are what make us into who we are.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your fantasies define you, so dream carefully. A man with no imagination is a man with no future in today’s world—and no past in tomorrow’s.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Art is the reflection of an imaginative mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: And people who don’t dream, who don’t have any kind of imaginative life, they must… they must go nuts. I can’t imagine that.
author: Stephen King

quote: I believe in intuition and inspiration. Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution. It is, strictly speaking, a real factor in scientific research.
author: Albert Einstein,  On Cosmic Religion and Other Opinions and Aphorisms

quote: Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Creativity flows when the mind is light. Be light and ignite your imagination.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: ***A KEY WORD*** Imagined
author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quote: And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: Our imagination flies -- we are its shadow on the earth.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Standing in the middle between the idea of an event and the actual event, a strange kind of physical reality just in the middle between possibility and reality.
author: Heisenberg

quote: A dream is a seed.Vision plants it.Imagination nurtures growth.Opportunities create blooms.Thoughts become things!
author: Donna McGoff

quote: The thing about a story is that you dream it as you tell it, hoping that others might then dream along with you, and in this way memory and imagination and language combine to make spirits in the head. There is the illusion of aliveness.
author: Tim O'Brien,  The Things They Carried
